metadata.Title: CVE-2017-12452 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.Description: The bfd_mach_o_i386_canonicalize_one_reloc function in bfd/mach-o-i386.c inthe Binary File Descriptor (BFD) library (aka libbfd), as distributed inGNU Binutils 2.29 and earlier, allows remote attackers to cause an out ofbounds heap read via a crafted mach-o file.

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
